programme.title: Why Do Fools Fall in Love
programme.desc: Three women (Halle Berry, Vivica A. Fox, Lela Rochon), all alleged widows of '50s singer Frankie Lymon, claim legal rights to his estate.

programme.title: Love Jones
programme.desc: Emotionally vulnerable Chicagoans (Larenz Tate, Nia Long) carry on a torrid affair but deny their burgeoning love.

programme.title: Black Hollywood
programme.desc: Exploring the roles of black actors, black directors and the black audience in American movies. Shot entirely on location in Hollywood in 1984.

programme.desc: Paid programming.

programme.title: Joshua
programme.desc: Men who return home from the Civil War with hopes of rebuilding their lives find death and destruction.

programme.title: Bad, Black and Beautiful
programme.desc: A man turns to an unstoppable attorney (Gwynn Barbee) after he's accused of killing his boss.

programme.title: The Return of Superfly
programme.desc: Ex-pusher Priest (Nathan Purdee), exiled in Paris, returns to New York and busts a big-time crack gang.

programme.desc: Host Sinbad; music guests Patti LaBelle and Kashif; comics Roger Behr and Ralph Harris.

programme.desc: Guest host Melba Moore. Aaron Hall and Cherrelle sing. Comedy by Terry Hodges.

programme.desc: The Beastie Boys host, Regina Belle, Stephanie Mills, The Breakfast Club, and comedy by Barry Sobel.

programme.title: To Love and to Cherish
programme.desc: A woman clashes with her teenage stepdaughter.

programme.title: In Sickness and in Health
programme.desc: Faith falls ill two weeks before she is going to marry Norman; secrets start to flare up and the couple realizes that love and sacrifice go hand-in-hand.

programme.title: From This Day Forward
programme.desc: Patrice (Essence Atkins) and Corrine (Vanessa Simmons), two sexy and confident women in great relationships, have to learn tough lessons about trust and fidelity to make their love last.

programme.title: Judge Dad
programme.desc: Recently moved to college, Andrew sues his parents for throwing away his magazine collection which he considered irreplaceable; his parents say that were they so valuable, he should have taken his collection with him in the first place.

programme.title: Judge Dad
programme.sub-title: I Get It From My Mama
programme.desc: Tammie-Lynn sues her mother, Charlene, for kicking her out of the house; Charlene says Tammie-Lynn needs to learn to be a grown-up and live in the real world.

programme.title: Judge Mom
programme.desc: Megan is suing her former best friend, Georgia, for the winnings from a soda company's sweepstakes.

programme.title: Crime Stoppers: Case Files
programme.sub-title: Male Dressed Opens Fire On Victim In A Car
programme.desc: Jahyna Ware was tragically murdered; Ernesto Ardines was outside school when killed; Sergeant Chris Reyka was murdered in the line of duty.

programme.title: Crime Stoppers: Case Files
programme.desc: In Los Angeles on December 3, 1978, Leslie Long, the mother of three was kidnapped from work during the robbery of a gas station in Palmdale.

programme.title: 50 Cent: Refuse 2 Die
programme.desc: Filmmaker Mike Corbera interviews friends and colleagues of the successful rapper.

programme.title: Ricochet
programme.desc: An escaped hit man (John Lithgow) seeks revenge on the policeman turned district attorney (Denzel Washington) who sent him to prison.
